title: X-Men
comments: An excellent movie in the X-Men universe!

title: Spider Man 2
comments: Probably the best Spider-Man movie ever made

title: Spider Man 3
comments: Not as good as the second one but still an iconic film

title: Valkryie
comments: Quite the story, one of the more underrated Tom Cruise movies

title: Ice Age
comments: A super quotable movie about an unlikely trio. My kids love Scrat!

title: Transformers
comments: The best transformers movie, they should have stopped after this one. It has held up surprisingly well

title: Magneto
comments: This movie was canceled. This is my biggest what-if for the X-Men universe and I will never forgive Fox for not making it

title: Kung Fu Panda
comments: This was highly recommended but I left disappointed.

title: Eagle Eye
comments: One of my favorites, reminds me of Enemy of the State in the best way!

title: Narnia 2
comments: Pretty good. My kids liked it a lot more than I did
